mapper.insert: insert into grapeems_leave_application(leaveApplicationCreateTime, leaveApplicationReason, leaveApplicationDetail, leaveApplicationLeaveStartTime, leaveApplicationLeaveEndTime, userId) values (#{leaveApplicationCreateTime}, #{leaveApplicationReason}, #{leaveApplicationDetail}, #{leaveApplicationLeaveStartTime}, #{leaveApplicationLeaveEndTime}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select * from grapeems_leave_application where isDeleted = 1 and leaveApplicationIsApprove = 0
select * from grapeems_leave_application where isDeleted = 1 and LeaveApplicationId = #{id}
select * from grapeems_leave_application where isDeleted = 1 and userId = #{userId}
